data.title: Taiwan explores launching national BTC reserve with confiscated crypto
data.body: Taiwan’s Prime Minister and the Central Bank have agreed to study the possibility of a national BTC reserve. The country would use seized BTC to build up a treasury. The Taiwan BTC initiative was presented to the Premier and Central Bank, seeking ways to convert Taiwan’s store of seized BTC into an official treasury.
